title: Gender equality in science in Slovenia and in EU / Enakost spolov v znanosti v Sloveniji in v EU

Time sharing is usually not possible with employers in Slovenia, which is a drawback for women with small children, and we don't have kind of dedicated support to mobility when one partner is going to another country.

For the job opportunity, and it's quite difficult to move the family with him, and especially the mobility is an issue in research because in research career with practically you have to be a little bit mobile in global world.
But if we go only to research sphere in Slovenia, we were quite successful in a way that we implement it.
Actually the equal opportunities in a way that maternity or paternity leave is excluded from all elections and evaluation system.

They employ this post graduate students.

The measure was so successful that this was actually an employment and what also was beneficial for enrolling women in this PhD studies was also the transparent selection process of this instrument.

Another kind of activity which we would like to increase in Slovenian research theories, not only to push the women to the higher levels of position in research careers, but also to engage more or to increase the share of women in advising expert bodies.
Research strategic bodies so they can have the voice there.

Actually the composition of the bodies, an agency improved because few years ago, I couldn't show the pictures of 1 sort of women in the expert bodies or in the Scientific Council, which is the highest body of the our Funding Agency.

We tried and they implement it.
Kind of internal legal act stating there in everybody of the agency at least 1/3 of women should be present in these bodies or on the if the body is dealing with the technical Sciences.
1/5 because it's due to the lower level of women in this discipline and they actually in few years it's sort of women in every expert body dealing with funding with evaluations.

Which state behind this legal act.
Another kind of field which we have still worked for women in science and to be kind of equal opportunities for women to have in science is national awards awards of excellence in science.

What we have made also as a support to increase the applications of women and finally the those who will get the awards is that before it was that only the institutions research institutions was entitled to nominate somebody for award and this was really kind of difficult for women.
